column5: Hey all,  I'm looking for a portable fish finder with a split screen. One half of the screen should have a hydrographic map of the area (showing all surrounding lake depths) and the other half should have a fish finder.  The fish finder must be portable...  Anyone seen such a madel?  thx

yes, there are a few models like you described. cant recall model number.... and actually this way i am not helping in any way. but most of the new makes and models over 500$, should have that. a beter way, from my experience, you should have 2 of them. one set up for dept, the other one as sonar.
